body_html:
charlesq34 - you said it works when you specify {isTrain: True}, but what if you need the condition to be dependent on the inputs?
I can't feed in advance the feed_dict on the "initialize_all_variables" stage [sess.run(init)], because I later on have multiple calls for sess.run().

any ideas?

body:
charlesq34 - you said it works when you specify {isTrain: True}, but what if you need the condition to be dependent on the inputs?
I can't feed in advance the feed_dict on the  "initialize_all_variables" stage [sess.run(init)], because I later on have multiple calls for sess.run().

any ideas?
